wikipedia_page.main: Simon Philip Jones  (born 25 December 1978) is a Welsh former cricketer, and data analytics head. He played county cricket for Glamorgan, Worcestershire and Hampshire County Cricket Clubs, before re-signing with his first county, Glamorgan, in December 2011 on a two-year deal. His father, Jeff Jones, played cricket for Glamorgan and England in the 1960s.
